title: The importance of learning context in science education: Contextualization pedagogy design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science education theories and basic pedagogical understanding for pre-service teachers
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive program designed to help pre-service teachers effectively utilize learning contexts in science lessons. Mobile-optimized content for smartphone-based environments is required.

learning_goals: Students can explain the four core elements of contextualized education in science education: learner agency, inquiry process, real-life connections, and community engagement.
Students can utilize tools to analyze context from the learner's perspective when designing science lessons.
Students can propose at least two examples of contextualized instructional activities applicable in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
